apps.author: ImranR98
apps.name: Obtainium
apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2265:
  * Always follow redirects and store cookies between redirects, including for downloads — useful for https://xeiaso.net/blog/2025/anubis (https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/2264)
  * Even more flexibility in the HTML source — JSON string extraction fallback (https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/2262)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.51...v1.1.52

apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* [auth] Update custom-icons.json by @Alf3rez in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4892
* [auth][mob] Fix 2FA recovery flow by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4908
* [auth] Fix logout button not showing on lockscreen by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4924
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4939
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5008
* [auth] Add icon for AJ Bell by @DanielTsiang in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5004
* [auth] Increase default  window height by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5039
* [auth] Add icon for Ankama & Seafile by @Drarox in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5030
* [auth] Add custom icon for EVE Online by @aitorres in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5078
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5085
* [auth] Delete unused code by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5094
* [auth] Add Gate.io icon by @Natoshi88 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5107
* [auth] Add Custom Icons (ButterflyMX / FreeTaxUSA) by @Fgeronimo in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5116
* [auth] Upgrade dio by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5137
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5144
* [auth] Add custom icons for No-IP, Prey Project, Workflowy + extra name for Nintendo Account by @aitorres in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5127
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5214
* [auth] BingX & CoinSpot Icons by @Caboose86 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5186
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5266
* [auth] Add support for editing number of digits & algorithm by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5190
* [auth] add luma icon by @Bl4ckspell7 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5276
* [auth] Add 2 new icons (MEXC & ICONOMI) by @sv3nnie in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5271
* [auth] Add icon for LinkedIn by @DanielTsiang in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5284
* [auth] remove ubuntu-20.04 runner & more by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5232
* [auth][mob] Fix change-password flow immediately after login by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5320
* [auth] Fix copy by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5412
* [auth][icon] Patient Access by @jacklroberts in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5413
* [auth][icon] add Pionex custom icon and entry to the icon data by @antoniohg in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5394
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5330
* [auth] Misc fixes & locale improvements by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5432
* [auth] Add Mbin custom icon by @vaguerant in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5530
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5492
* [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5613
* [auth] Add Postmark logo by @dantman in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5611
* [mob][auth] Fix lock screen appearing on reinstall (iOS/macOS) if previously installed instance had lock screen enabled by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5617
* [auth] Add advanced options to edit period & TOTP by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5520

## New Contributors
* @erannave made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4925
* @DanielTsiang made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5004
* @Drarox made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5030
* @Rflew33 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5072
* @aitorres made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5078
* @edoardo-mileto made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5096
* @Natoshi88 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5107
* @Fgeronimo made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5116
* @Caboose86 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5186
* @Iiii-I-I-I made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5267
* @jacklroberts made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5413
* @antoniohg made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/5394

apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* Update Google privileged browsers list by @github-actions in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4910
* PM-19550:  Accept app language settings "System default" by @dseverns-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4922
* PM-19559 Remove "Give feedback" from Settings > About by @dseverns-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4924
* Update passkey privileged app community list by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4923
* [PM-8331] Using default send url when on US cloud by @aj-rosado in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4925
* PM-19547: Delay the delete account success dialog to avoid flicker by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4927
* Update the README dependencies section and clean up toml file by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4926
* [PM-19013] Create core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4836
* PM-19543: Add flight recorder feature flag by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4929
* [PM-19616] Move OmitFromCoverage annotation to core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4928
* [PM-19624] Migrate DataState to core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4930
* PM-19466: Fix snackbar ime padding by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4933
* Autosync Crowdin Translations by @bw-ghapp in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4935
* [PM-19626] Migrate SharedFlowExtensions to core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4931
* Run detekt on `authenticatorbridge` module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4940
* PM-19653: Add tooltip and subtext tupport for the switch by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4936
* [PM-19628] Migrate ResultExtensions to core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4934
* PM-19723 Group "no folder" items when there is a collection present. by @dseverns-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4941
* [PM-19640] Migrate SpecialCharWithPrecedenceComparator to core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4942
* Fix detekt issues in `authenticator` tests by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4944
* PM-19404: Improve email validation and validation error parsing by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4945
* Update to AGP 8.9.1 by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4947
* Add matching fallback for the `beta` build type to `release` by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4946
* [PM-19652] Consolidate check configurations by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4937
* [PM-19627] Migrate JsonExtensions to core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4932
* [PM-19738] Create `network` module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4948
* [PM-19625] Migrate DataStateExtensions to core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4943
* PM-19131 - Custom hidden fields not working properly if TOTP also configured by @phil-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4916
* [PM-19772] Remove scan-authenticator.yml by @vvolkgang in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4952
* Update the Hilt and Androidx dependencies by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4954
* PM-19645: Remove new device feature flags by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4950
* PM-19705: Log reason for logout by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4959
* [PM-19738] Migrate NetworkResultCallAdapter to `network` module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4949
* Update network module minSdk version by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4961
* [PM-19782] Migrate network error handling to `network` module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4957
* Update CODEOWNERS by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4965
* PM-19807: Remove IconResource class by @david-livefront in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4963
* [PM-19793] Migrate ZonedDateTimeSerializer to core module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4960
* [PM-19820] Replace `ResultCallAdapterFactory` in authenticator module by @SaintPatrck in https://github.com/bitwarden/android/pull/4968

apps.changeLog:
### Changes:

* Fixed crashes and app not responding dialogs caused by JXL support (https://github.com/FossifyOrg/Gallery/issues/301)
* Improved scrolling performance and interface (https://github.com/FossifyOrg/Gallery/issues/136)
* Added user friendly error messages for media load failures (https://github.com/FossifyOrg/Gallery/commit/1edcd5d16195cb6e8a224accf08d9da017059d6d)
* Other minor bug fixes and improvements
* Added more translations

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FossifyOrg/Gallery/compare/1.2.0...1.2.1

apps.author: thunderbird
apps.name: Thunderbird
apps.additionalSettings: {"includePrereleases":false,"fallbackToOlderReleases":true,"filterReleaseTitlesByRegEx":"Thunderbird","filterReleaseNotesByRegEx":"","verifyLatestTag":false,"sortMethodChoice":"date","useLatestAssetDateAsReleaseDate":false,"releaseTitleAsVersion":false,"trackOnly":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"","matchGroupToUse":"","versionDetection":false,"releaseDateAsVersion":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"apkFilterRegEx":"","invertAPKFilter":false,"autoApkFilterByArch":true,"appName":"Thunderbird","appAuthor":"Thunderbird","shizukuPretendToBeGooglePlay":false,"allowInsecure":false,"exemptFromBackgroundUpdates":false,"skipUpdateNotifications":false,"about":"Thunderbird for Android – Open Source Email App for Android (fka K-9 Mail).","refreshBeforeDownload":false}
apps.changeLog:
New:
- Server field pre-filled in manual account setup
- Add a menu entry to empty the Spam folder
- Introduce an option to use the system theme on Android 10 and older


Changed:
- Update PushService to run as a specialUse foreground service for Android 15
- Update Gmail OAuth client IDs to Thunderbird for Android
- Preserve the \<s\> tag when sanitizing HTML content


Fixed:
- Messages and star counts in the drawer update instantly
- Folder names in the drawer are limited to two lines
- Hide accounts setting now remembered across restarts
- Account names in the drawer display as single lines when not set
- Option to use text processing apps (like Translate) when selecting text
- Recipient field now focused automatically when composing
- Display the recipient's address instead of +1 and fix its size
- Correct MIME type for .pkpass files
- Accessibility improvements
- Restart PushService after app update
- Restrict displaying message search results to internal and system usages
- Messages with one correspondent no longer showed "+1" incorrectly
- Account email no longer duplicated in drawer header

Contributors:
* @imAtulSharma made their first contribution in https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/pull/8695
* @Ephemera42 made their first contribution in https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/pull/8713
* @williamspiegel made their first contribution in https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/pull/8692
* @akash0228 made their first contribution in https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/pull/8780
* Thank you also to @cketti, @coreycb, @jfx2006, @kewisch, @marcRDZ, @monica-thunderbird, @shamim-emon, @terofeev, @wmontwe

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/compare/THUNDERBIRD_9_0...THUNDERBIRD_10_0
